title: Assorted Film Making Accessories
brief_description: “Coated Walz Filter for Color Film housed in original cardboard box. Walz brand clear plastic case with lid and base. Metal rimmed light brown/orange glass lens. Instructions included Kodak Kodachrome 25 colour movie film daylight for 8mm roll (7.5m KM459P) Tin can embossed with Kodak logo on the top. Unused reel of film. Tin sealed together with black duct tape. Original box Envelope Instructions Film price includes processing by Kodak. Mailing envelope enclosed (this has never been used and is folded in a small square) 7.5 metres in length of douible 8mm film on this roll which is intended to yield 15 metres in length of 8mm movies. The additional film at each end serves as leader and trailer for light protection and camera loading. Process before Oct 1979. KM459P CAT 416 9918 Daylight, ASA 25, 15 DIN 2 pairs of mono ear buds to be plugged in to a crystal radio. 1. Brown leather pouch with pink ear bud. 2. Black vinyl puch with cream ear bud. Sunbeam lens brush. Sundry cord in ziplock bag. National brand. Could possibly have been a cord to connect flash. However there doesn’t see to be a donated item which this pairs with. Cyldon brand film reel. (for 8mm) Light metal (tin?). Made in England Markers for 50, 100, 150 and 200 feet.”
